entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump They've been losing their jobs because of your lack of leadership on CoronaVirus.  Unemployment at an all-time high, economy in the dumper, escalating American deaths, record-breaking national deficit.  Your mind - if you ever had one - has been on endless vacation since birth.
